meanings.definition: (植物学)二強雄蕊の、二長雄蕊の
meanings.english_definition: (botany) having two stamens longer than the other two.

examples.sentence: The didynamian flowers are characteristic of the family Lamiaceae.
examples.translation: 二強雄蕊の花はシソ科の特徴である。

synonyms: tetradynamous (four long and two short stamens)
